Rodimus Prime sat there on the bed listening carefully to Perceptor
and Kup=
 as they spoke, especially Perceptor's confessions as to what
he had done t=
o Nihtlight. He could not help but feel a stab of guilt
for his role in the=
 whole thing. Yes he was under the control of the
Predacon shell program, b=
ut still he could feel guilt piercing him
like a white hot blade. For the m=
oment he could say nothing, but the
anguish on his face spoke volumes!

"Wh=
at can be done to help her now?" Santon said as he looked at
Perceptor, a b=
rief look of fear for Nightlight and discust for what
had happened to her f=
lashing across his features. "How much damage do
you do to her?"

Legacy, w=
ho had been standing in the shadows up to this time, looking
more like a we=
apon of war than doctor looked at Perceptor, his single
optic glowing brigh=
tly and steadily, his piercing gaze observing
Perceptor thoughtfully, "Perh=
aps she sould be brought here so that her
status can be ascertained?"

Mean=
while Torca, who had been observing nodded to Tuscon, his great
horned head=
 almost scraping the cieling as he advised them to wait
before they had thi=
er briefing. "You are correct Tuscon." he said, his
deep voice filling the =
room. "I shall wait for a short time. However
the council's message will no=
t wait long."

Torca turned to leave, he could see Silverbolt standing just=
 outside
the medical chamber still looking through the glass. He had left
S=
ilverbolt in charge of the Fuzors while he had been away, now it was
time t=
o catch up.

He stepped out of the and into the observation room, "Silverbo=
lt."
Torca said as he moved his large bulk through the doorway followed by
=
Bantor. "It has been some time."

(TAG)

Preston

(OOC: Keep in mind Torca =
is leader of the Fuzors here at the moment
and a high ranking general)
http=
://www.tfu.info/1998/Maximal/Bantor/bantor.htm
http://www.tfu.info/1998/Max=
imal/Torca/torca.htm

how. It's the only thing that I've done to

ght was captured , how Rodimus was captured and how you
